data.comment: The big names in today's match at St James' Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 1, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Goal! Dwight Gayle gives Newcastle a 1-0 lead in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Jonjo Shelvey instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 4, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
Newcastle drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 6, Newcastle have a goal kick.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 9, Free kick Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 10, Anthony Taylor signals a Newcastle throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Anthony Taylor awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Nabil Bentaleb is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Nabil Bentaleb has recovered and rejoins the match in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Important block from the Newcastle defence as Divock Origi fires in a strike for Liverpool.
In the minute 23, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Liverpool's half?
Takumi Minamino of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Anthony Taylor signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Newcastle, close to Liverpool's area.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Newcastle's Federico Fernandez gets in a shot on goal at St James' Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Federico Fernandez (Newcastle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 35, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Liverpool are coming forward and Naby Keita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 35, In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick in a good position for Liverpool!
Goal! Liverpool draw level to 1-1 through a Virgil van Dijk header.
In the minute 38, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain with an assist there.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 42, Liverpool's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Anthony Taylor blows against Newcastle's Miguel Almiron for offside.
Anthony Taylor will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Newcastle needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
Takumi Minamino gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
The first-half has come to a close in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Liverpool attack through Neco Williams. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 46, Anthony Taylor awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Joelinton is replacing Allan Saint-Maximin for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In Newcastle upon Tyne, Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 49, Anthony Taylor signals a Newcastle throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Sean Longstaff is on a sub for Nabil Bentaleb for Newcastle.
In the minute 51, Newcastle are pushing forward but Sean Longstaff's finish is wide of the goal.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Newcastle's area.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 59, Divock Origi is on target to give Liverpool a 1-2 advantage.
Great play from Andrew Robertson to set up the goal.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 64, Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a first substitution, with Roberto Firmino replacing Divock Origi.
Liverpool make their second substitution with Sadio Mane replacing Takumi Minamino.
The away team replace Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain with Mohamed Salah.
In the minute 65, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Throw-in Newcastle.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 66, Liverpool's Mohamed Salah fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 69, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andy Carroll is replacing Dwight Gayle for the home team.
Steve Bruce is making the team's third substitution at St James' Park with Isaac Hayden replacing Miguel Almiron.
In the minute 71, Liverpool push forward at St James' Park and Naby Keita gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is caught offside.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Anthony Taylor signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
The home team replace Danny Rose with Kelland Watts.
In the minute 76, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Newcastle are caught offside.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Anthony Taylor waits before resuming play because Neco Williams for Liverpool is still down.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Trent Alexander-Arnold is replacing Naby Keita for the away team.
In the minute 85, Curtis Jones (Liverpool) has replaced the possibly injured Neco Williams at St James' Park.
Anthony Taylor signals a Liverpool throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Liverpool at St James' Park.
Goal! Liverpool extend their lead to 1-3 through Sadio Mane.
That's a fine assist from Roberto Firmino.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Newcastle.
At St James' Park the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
